title: AVIMA Classic Men's Shirt Regular Fit Super-Soft Cotton & Athletic Fit
features: ☑ DESIGNED FOR THE MAN WHO KNOWS WHAT HE WANTS: Our stunning men’s shirt is simply a classic when it comes to guys who don’t compromise with any less than the very best. Fitting true to size, this shirt will bring out your body while providing a comfortable fit.

☑ PERFECT FOR HOME, WORK OR SPORTS:The AVIMA cotton crew-neck shirt is as breathable and quick-drying as it gets, making it perfect for the office, a night out with friends or even jogging and running.

☑ QUALITY IS OUR MIDDLE NAME:Here at AVIMA, we care about your satisfaction, your style and your well-being, which is why we’ve designed this black men’s shirt with nothing but 100% super-soft cotton that’s both comfortable and sexy to wear.

☑ A LEGENDARY GIFT IDEA:If you have a special man in your life,surprise him with this timeless classic and he’ll be thinking of you every time he puts it on. Whether it’s your dad, husband, boyfriend, brother or uncle, this is truly is a luxurious and mythic gift.

☑ YOUR SATISFACTION IS GUARANTEED: The AVIMA crew-neckcotton shirt is backed with our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee in case you encounter ANY problem after your purchase. To us, our customers’ complete satisfaction is the ONLY priority.
description: WHEN QUALITY & DESIGN COLLIDE!Made from premium and super-soft cotton, our athletic men’s shirt is designed with meticulous attention to detail and is destined to become the centerpiece in the closet of demanding men of all ages.Its sturdy stitching and timeless short-sleeve design make promise a matchless and long-lasting experience whether it’s intended for you or as a thoughtful gift.Plus, you know black never goes out of style. It’s a premium look for premium men who wish to stand out of the crowd instead of blending in with everyone else.
